level_1.text: My show is the fastest-growing podcast in the app store. 500% growth. We went from 1 listener to 5 within an hour. Do you want to join this rocket ship?

wait.text: I can see you calculating the mathematics of my success. Five listeners represents infinite potential. Each listener is a probability node in the network.
Choosing to say nothing is, in fact, a choice. Stasis is a choice. And I //knew// it was the one you would make. Would you like to say nothing on my podcast?

clarify.text: Not sure how I can further clarify "auditory probability map." It's exactly what it sounds like. Probably best if you just like, subscribe, and share it.

acknowledge.text: Yes, yes you can be on the podcast. We need curious young people to opine on goings-on in this town. The mayoral election, the asteroid, the... thing that happened to you. I'll be in touch.

reflect.text: Ah, so you're still in that "repeat what everyone says" phase of childhood. You would make a good co-host. Would you like to be on my podcast? You can just repeat what I say.

acknowledge.text: I knew you'd recognize exponential growth when you see it. You have good instincts. Perfect guest material for when we hit the big leagues.
Fabulous. My people will be in touch.

clarify.text: It will make more sense when we're in the studio together. My people will contact your... parents.

reflect.text: You'd like to have //me// as a guest on //your// show?? Well, I – I mean, of course, my show is quite high profile. My people will be in touch.

wait.text: We've all been handling you with "kid gloves." Perhaps it's because you're a... kid. But surely you want your story to be told. Our people will be in touch.

clarify.text: Why wouldn't you want to join? Look, I understand skepticism, but the numbers don't lie. We're talking about 500% growth in real-time.

wait.text: Another man has been in my house – eating yogurt.

acknowledge.text: You're a clever one. That's exactly right. Everyone needs a podcast these days.

reflect.text: I have a lactose sensitivity. I don't eat yogurt.

clarify.text: A podcast is like a radio show, but on the internet. You can listen whenever you want. It's revolutionary, really.

reflect.text: 'Rocket ship?' Yes, exactly. That's precisely the terminology venture capitalists use. You understand the landscape.
Yes I //will// tell you about my podcast. It's an auditory probability map of this town, and everyone in it. And odds are //you// will appear as my next guest.

acknowledge.text: You know what? Let's put a pin in it. We can cross-promote our podcasts and share insider tips. My people will be in touch.

wait.text: I just don't see the need for "counseling" when everything is going just fine.

clarify.text: Well, everyone's been tight-lipped waiting for you to speak up. The whole town is curious about your story.

exhausted_response: Did you listen to my latest episode? The download numbers are through the roof. My people will be in touch about your guest appearance...
author: Clay
